comments.author: Dr Ishmael.9685
comments.body: Ah, I guess didn’t understand what your point was. This should be reported in the Game Bugs forum, not here.

comments.author: Samuirai.4561
comments.body: well the API is used ingame. And it affects the TP. When you search for items etc. you see wrong prices.

comments.author: Dr Ishmael.9685
comments.body: The TP API isn’t officially supported (yet), so assuming this is intended as a bug report, don’t expect any response.

comments.author: Samuirai.4561
comments.body:
There seems to be a problem with the caching of prices for (all or certain) items. Like the Chaos of Lyssa Recipe

It’s especially annoying ingame when you search for items or want to check some prices. And you have to do additional clicks to get to the real current price.
